content: this hairpin lace wrap can be worn as a poncho halter capelet shrug or shawl depending on how you wrap or fasten it **materials** - 316 yards super bulky weight ribbon yarn - hairpin lace loom set to 5 25 - size k crochet hook or size to obtain gauge - tapestry needle - two buttons **gauge information** substitute yarn should have a gauge of 11 stitches per 4 as stated on yarn label gauge in hairpin lace is 18 loops per 4 inches
